name: Orionide: Prologue
detailed_description:
Orionide: Prologue contains explicit sexual imagery. Please leave this page if you are not 18 years or older, or if you are offended by sexual content.

The beginning of the Orionide series of adult games introduces its two main (nameable) characters. Their relationship is broken and lacking intimacy. They dream of sexual satisfaction, each in their own way.

Dive into their dreams and experience their bliss for yourself!

Orionide: Prologue is a game in the style of Visual Novels. You advance through the game through point-and-click mechanics. It features a daytime system and different sexual events take place in different places at different times. Find them all and upgrade the sex scenes to bigger, more lavish versions.

Sexual content includes: blowjobs, deepthroat, titfucking, teasing, anal, 69, cumshots and more.

260+ HQ images rendered at 1440p (but scale down or up to every resolution.)


Please enjoy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 32-Bit
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 949 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game is for mature audiences (18+) only as it contains uncensored, full frontal nudity and sexually explicit imagery.
